unitName: Mental health issues: Grief, trauma and substance abuse
description: This unit focuses on the types and incidence of mental health issues and their effects on the individual, family and community. It examines a variety of issues around trauma and grief, addictions to alcohol, drugs, and other mental health issues. Students examine how declining mental health can affect feelings, thoughts and actions. Students are introduced to a number of therapeutic approaches.
